name: You Only Move Twice
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder, Dan Greaney (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer takes a new job in a new town. However, his friendly new boss might be a super villain bent on world domination.
